headline: KAL’s cartoon

children.data: Dig deeper into the subject of this week’s cartoon:
Cold-war lessons from China’s spy balloon
A new challenge to relations between America and China
KAL’s cartoon appears weekly in The Economist. You can see last week’s

bodyText:
Dig deeper into the subject of this week’s cartoon:
Cold-war lessons from China’s spy balloon (Feb 2023)
China’s ultra-fast economic recovery (Feb 2023)
A new challenge to relations between America and China (Jan 2023)
KAL’s cartoon appears weekly in The Economist. You can see last week’s here.

parts.headline: This week’s covers
parts.description: How we saw the world

cover.headline: Chatbots and the battle for search

parts.headline: This week’s covers
parts.description: How we saw the world

parts.headline: The battle for internet search
parts.description: Will the AI chatbots eat Google’s lunch?

parts.headline: The devastating earthquakes in Turkey and Syria might upend politics, too
parts.description: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan faces a tough election in May

parts.headline: Arab petrostates must prepare their citizens for a post-oil future
parts.subheadline: A new social contract in the Gulf
parts.description: Better schools and a political voice would be a start

parts.headline: How to promote academic freedom in America
parts.description: Colleges that promote ideological conformity do students a disservice

parts.headline: Cold-war lessons from China’s spy balloon
parts.description: To avoid perilous misunderstanding, the two sides should talk more

parts.headline: The humbling of Gautam Adani is a test for Indian capitalism
parts.description: The biggest tycoons need the sternest scrutiny
